mapper.select: select id, box_id, status, box_belong, obd_name, port_count from obd-scan.pc_obd_info where id = #{id}
select id, box_id, status, box_belong, obd_name, port_count from obd-scan.pc_obd_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into obd-scan.pc_obd_info(box_id, status, box_belong, obd_name, port_count) values (#{boxId}, #{status}, #{boxBelong}, #{obdName}, #{portCount})

insert into obd-scan.pc_obd_info(box_id, status, box_belong, obd_name, port_count) values
(#{entity.boxId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.boxBelong}, #{entity.obdName}, #{entity.portCount})

insert into obd-scan.pc_obd_info(box_id, status, box_belong, obd_name, port_count) values
(#{entity.boxId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.boxBelong}, #{entity.obdName}, #{entity.portCount})
on duplicate key update box_id = values(box_id) , status = values(status) , box_belong = values(box_belong) , obd_name = values(obd_name) , port_count = values(port_count)
mapper.update:
update obd-scan.pc_obd_info
box_id = #{boxId},
status = #{status},
box_belong = #{boxBelong},
obd_name = #{obdName},
port_count = #{portCount},
where id = #{id}
